para0.title: Introduction.
para0.para: This section describes the scope, purpose, and content arrangement of this chapter.

subpara1.title: Scope.
subpara1.para: This chapter provides the theory of operation for each of the LRUs tested with the AN/PSM-130 APS.

subpara1.title: Purpose.
subpara1.para: The purpose of this chapter is to provide the maintenance technician with the knowledge necessary to understand how the Test Program provides for the switching and routing of power, stimulus, and measurement signals between the Test Station and the Unit Under Test (UUT).

subpara1.title: Content Arrangement.
subpara1.para: This chapter is divided into twelve sections. Section I provides the introduction, which includes the scope and purpose of the content provided in this chapter. Sections II through XI each contain information on a single UUT. Section XII contains information on the AN/PSM-130 TPH Self-Test.
